references.paper_title: Neural codec language models are zero-shot text to speech synthesizers
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel neural codec language model that achieves zero-shot text-to-speech synthesis, a significant advancement in the field.

references.paper_title: Naturalspeech 3: Zero-shot speech synthesis with factorized codec and diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents Naturalspeech 3, a state-of-the-art zero-shot speech synthesis model that uses factorized codecs and diffusion models to achieve high-quality, natural-sounding speech.

references.paper_title: Voicebox: Text-guided multilingual universal speech generation at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces Voicebox, a large-scale, multilingual speech generation model that produces high-quality, natural-sounding speech in multiple languages.
This paper introduces Soundstorm, an efficient parallel audio generation model that is capable of generating high-quality audio at a faster rate.

references.paper_title: Base TTS: Lessons from building a billion-parameter text-to-speech model on 100k hours of data
references.reason: This paper reports on the development of BaseTTS, a large-scale text-to-speech model trained on 100k hours of data, demonstrating the importance of large datasets for advancing speech generation research.
